properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu yesu rammanuchunde papula nellarini vacchina variki prabhuyesunde vishrantinichu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokamulo maanavulella ghora paapamulu jesi devuni mahimaku dooramaipoyiri maanavula neethi kriyalu muriki pelikale{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu Yesu kristu nandu ye papa doshamu ledu mraanupai vreladenuga mana doshamula korakai maranamu gelchi vijayamunichi neetiga tirche{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yendaru visvasinturo prabhu vaina kristuni vaare pondedaruga nityamaina rakshana nede meekanukoola samayamu rakshana dinamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papamunu kshaminchutaku prabhuke adikaramu kaladu yevari papadoshamulu pariharimpabaduno vaare danyulu paralokamulo nischayamuga{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paralokapu tandriki putrulu visvasinchina vaaregaa theerpu maranamuleka jeevamu pondedaru Paripoornulugaa kaduga badudi Yesuni rakthamulo{/lang-eng}
